Sept. 15, 1979 D Dronfield Contest (Open Section)
North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival (Open Section) 400 Test Piece Contest North East Derbyshire District Council Annual Brass Band Festival dronfield-contest-open-section
None
Rhapsody in Brass
Sports Centre, Dronfield, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £130 and trophy, 2nd £60, 3rd £30. 4 bands competed. 21st annual contest.
May 28, 2014, 6:49 a.m. March 29, 2017, 7:52 p.m.
